version_description: - A bug causing a crash of the application when a workout include  « Cool down » option has been resolved.
- A bug causing a crash of the application when a workout include  « Cool down » option has been resolved.
- A bug causing a crash of the application when a workout include  « Cool down » option has been resolved.
- A bug causing a crash of the application when a workout include  « Cool down » option has been resolved.
- A bug causing a crash of the application when a workout include  « Cool down » option has been resolved.

New in this update :

- Adding a settings section.
- You can reorder your timer inside interval.
- Deleting the banner ad on the home screen for users of the free version.
- Improved preview mode of workout.
- Easy acces to edit your workout.
- Improved performance.
- Minor bug fix.

A big thanks to all those who sent me messages to propose new features or reported a bug.

What's new in version 1.2 :

- Now the workout can run in background. For a better experience it is recommended to accept the notification.
- The voice tells you the name of each timer once he starts.
- It is now possible to set the time where the voice announce the next timer.
- You can now customize the color of every workout.
- Minor bug fix

A big thank you to everyone for your feedback.
